title: Cryptocurrency Price Prediction Using Machine Learning
description: This program helps in forecasting cryptocurrency prices by training a machine learning model to predict future bitcoin prices based on historical data.

title: REST-API-CRUD-Operation
description: A Java-based application using Hibernate, Spring Boot, Maven, JSP, and Servlets that enables efficient Create, Read, Update, and Delete (CRUD) operations with seamless RESTful API interaction.

title: Flight Reservation Project
description: A comprehensive airline E-commerce website using Java Spring Boot, MySQL, AngularJS, and Thymeleaf, featuring secure user authentication, flight search, booking, and check-in functionalities.

title: Blog Application (SpringBoot Project)
description: A secure blogging application using Spring Security for authentication and authorization. It supports CRUD operations for blog posts with Spring Boot, Maven, and Postman.

title: Hospital Management Application
description: A full-stack application using HTML, CSS, Bootstrap, and Spring Thymeleaf for the frontend, with MySQL, Spring Boot, and Hibernate for backend functionalities such as CRUD operations and report downloads.

title: Bitcoin Mining Application
description: A Java Spring Boot app enabling Bitcoin mining and user account management, with RESTful API endpoints for transaction history viewing, configuration settings, and logging.

title: Multiple File Upload Using Spring Boot
description: A Spring Boot application that facilitates uploading multiple files into a database via a RESTful API, demonstrating multipart file handling and storage with Spring Data JPA.

title: QR Code Generator
description: A Java project that creates unique QR codes for various inputs, with customizable options for size and error correction levels, accessible through a REST API.

title: Awesome Portfolio Collection
description: A comprehensive repository containing over 100 portfolio collections crafted using HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and other technologies, offering a diverse range of designs and functionalities.

title: GitHub Streak Back
description: A tool that helps restore broken GitHub streaks by automating contributions using Node.js and Git commands, designed for developers who missed a commit.

title: AlgoByPrabhat
description: A platform designed to simplify learning complex data structures and algorithms with interactive and engaging visualizations.

title: Sharma AI
description: A voice-activated virtual assistant allowing users to control their computer with voice commands. Built with HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Node.js, and AppleScript.

title: User Details App
description: A Spring Boot-based CRUD application for managing personal information with validation and MySQL integration.

title: SpringBoot-OpenAI
description: A Spring Boot-based API integration with OpenAI, allowing seamless interaction with AI models for generating responses and text processing.

title: Mobile Banking
description: A Spring Boot application providing banking services like account management, transactions, and secure fund transfers, ensuring high security and scalability.

title: Uber Application
description: A Spring Boot-based ride-hailing platform that allows users to book rides, track drivers, estimate fares, and make secure payments.

title: Cafe Management System
description: A Spring Boot application for managing cafe operations, including order management, menu customization, billing, and customer management.

title: Ollama Spring Boot AI Implementation
description: Integrates Spring Boot with Ollama AI models to provide real-time AI-powered responses using models like DeepSeek R1.

title: LinkedIn Application
description: A microservices-based project replicating key features of LinkedIn, such as user management, connections, posts, and notifications, using Eureka for service discovery and API Gateway.
